entries.title: Rape posts every half-hour found on online incel forum
entries.description: More must be done to tackle women-hating movement incel, the Centre for Countering Digital Hate warns.

entries.title: The firms making flour from mushrooms and cauliflower
entries.description: The search for wheat alternatives is being driven by a demand for healthier diets and food security.

entries.title: Australia phones cyber-attack exposes personal data
entries.description: Optus is looking into the unauthorised access of data including names, addresses and passport numbers.

entries.title: Ted Lasso characters join Fifa 23
entries.description: The fictional AFC Richmond will be available in the the latest version of the popular football game.
